entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 6:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
